website_summaries.verdict: Fast and Bluetooth-friendly laptop that is also attractively priced.
pros: High marks from those who work remotely or travel and need a trusty laptop
Powers up quickly and delivers results
Functions well with multiple applications open at once

customer_reviews.title: NOT Windows 10 Pro!
customer_reviews.text: While the machine itself is great, this is NOT Windows 10 PRO AS ADVERTISED. Unfortunately, under time-constraint so upgraded it in place, but that's another $99. I would not buy from this Seller again for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: TMC1

customer_reviews.title: SSD not HD
customer_reviews.text: Bought this laptop for work. Runs great so far, had it for about a month. Really wanted this because of the SSD and the quick startup capabilities. I regularly run quite a few windows at the same time and haven’t had any problems yet. Only thing negative I can say is that the touchpad is a little finicky and I wish it had a backlit keyboard (my fault for not researching it enough). I use this with a docking station so the touchpad is not really an issue though.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: This is Windows 10 S ---- NOT Windows 10 PRO like you expect
customer_reviews.text: Sent this back because it's the Windows TABLET version of the OS. Don't know why Seller is hiding this HUGE detail!
customer_reviews.author: j4piper

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Resolution!
customer_reviews.text: this was not a good computer. the screen resolution was pathetic. i bought if for my son... and he can't even use it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven VanErmen

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price point
customer_reviews.text: This laptop was litterally the only one on the internet that had excatly what i was looking for and i am pretty happy with it. My 2015 macbook air is my daily driver, but i need a windows computer for quickbooks. it boots fast enough, i have had no software issues, however my "w" key comes off.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Great but noisy
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have with it is that when I type (left side of the keyboard) it is very noisy. The "E" button is loose. I should have sent it back but really needed for work since my old laptop died. Aside from that it's a great computer.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah Medestomas

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop good price, decent speed and amenities .
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it. Great value for the price. Good size screen, speed is fine for my needs, windows 10 pro, DVD drive, so far so good. The windows edge software tries to limit files I can download but there are ways around it. Backlit Keyboard would have been better.
customer_reviews.author: Arty B

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: GENERALLY GOOD - BUT DID NOT WANT TO CONNECT TO OFFICE WIFI
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: Not what was stated
customer_reviews.text: PC did not contain DVD-RW drive. It did come with Windows 10 Pro thankfully. Also Processor is an i5-8265u, not the 7th gen mentioned in the description. Laptop case surrounding keyboard/mouse has a mesh pattern not shown in product images. Unsure if this was a mismatched order, but would re-order this item's correct listing
customer_reviews.author: K B

customer_reviews.title: Battery dead
customer_reviews.text: Had this for 15 months, barley used it and the battery in the computer had already died and will not hold a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Donithorne

customer_reviews.title: Regardless of what the specs say no 5G
customer_reviews.text: Computer is very fast with the SSD it comes with. Not a fan of the touchpad. Very nice display and having Bluetooth is a big plus. Overall a very nice computer for the price.
customer_reviews.author: william j steve

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, this is a great little computer
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, this is a great little computer. I use it mostly for work, I'm a remote implementer for a software company.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie S.

customer_reviews.title: the computer works great, but the power supply was hiding in the ...
customer_reviews.text: exactly as published, the computer works great, but the power supply was hiding in the back part of the box, easy to miss.
customer_reviews.author: Arie Guttman

customer_reviews.title: BUTER BEWARE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This says it comes with Windows 10 Pro but it actually came with Windows 10 Home. I am extremely upset as I was forced to pay $99 to upgrade the software as my requirements are Pro specific.
customer_reviews.author: Berman's S.

customer_reviews.title: plesently surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was very nervous about buying this. But it turned out to be great works like it should and more. LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: City of Assumption

customer_reviews.title: NOT NEW LAPTOP HARD DRIVES HAVE BEEN REPLACED
customer_reviews.text: These are not new dell computers! they have removed the 500 gig hard drive and replaced with a 256gig ssd drive and loaded win 10 pro
customer_reviews.author: Prestonp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This computer for the money is real fast and the colors are so bright
customer_reviews.author: August Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not Windows 10 Pro
customer_reviews.text: Product is not true to description. Laptop came with Windows 10 Home, instead of Windows 10 Pro.
customer_reviews.author: BN
